siteQueries.name: Columbus - Count
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '101' AND completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Columbus - Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '101' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Addison - Count
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '100' AND completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Addison - Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '100' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Lake City - Count
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '107' AND completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Lake City - Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '107' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Total - Count
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Total - Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Lake City - Sales (Calculated)
siteQueries.query: Calculated as Total Sales - (Columbus Sales + Addison Sales)

columbus.sales: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '101' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

lakeCity.sales: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '107' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())
